title: Transblack
brief_description: Transblack is a four-part television mini series following the lives of four First Nations people as they navigate love, family, culture, grief and change, as transgender individuals.

constellations_other.name: Broadcasting marginal voices
constellations_other.description: The creation of Indigenous broadcasting in Central Australia from the late 1970s meant an array of diverse Black stories could be shared. Today, important stories told by those who physically and metaphorically live on the margins can be broadcast widely.

description: Transblack is a four-part television mini series following the lives of four First Nations people as they navigate love, family, culture, grief and change, as transgender individuals.
